message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. Consider the inflation working against us both.
Your offer was tempting, Alice, but let's be practical. Inflation hurts you more each round. I propose a 52/48 split in my favor.  Think carefully before rejecting - time is money!
Bob, I'm willing to negotiate. I propose a 51/49 split in my favor. This offer won't be on the table for long, time is precious for both of us.
